title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 203.12 - Vehicle repairs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 203.12 - Vehicle repairs

State Regulations

No vehicles shall be repaired on authority facilities
property unless under the supervision and direction of an authority agent or
employee. Such repairs shall include, but not be limited to, the changing of
tires. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
203.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
